projectGridLines.title: Root Cause Analysis and Recommendation system
projectGridLines.description:
Description and Outcome: Financial services organizations leverage Big Data frameworks / techniques to run their heavy data processing and machine learning applications for their business usecases. These frameworks require large compute to cater to Service Level Objectives (SLOs) associated with the application. A data scientists/analytical user often conducts multiple experiments which sometimes give error codes/prompts due to some error in pipeline or syntax. Often the user spends a lot of time on internet to understand the error and rectify it. Being a financial organization ChatGPT and other relevant open-source tools are not available for consumption readily.

 

The candidate is expected to leverage the existing LLMs and tune them to convert the error prompts into understandable form and suggest possible options to rectify the error custom to Amex environment. For example, a ETL pyspark code could be failing due to a peculiar nature of a hive table then the expected output would be to highlight that behavior to user and resolution basis that.

 

Skill sets: Python, Linux / Unix understanding, Big Data fundamentals such as Hadoop, Spark, Algorithms, Data Structures.

 

Expected learning: Big Data Environment and execution mechanism for a distributed job. Principles of optimizing the Big Data Jobs.

 

Specific courses required for project execution: Programming in Python, Linux / Unix understanding, Data structures. Acquaintance with Big Data environments and Gen AI will be an added advantage

projectGridLines.title: BigQuery Optimizer and Quantifier
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

1.    Gathercodes ofBigQueryjobs from GCP alongwith resources utilization stats.

2.    Conduct thorough analysis to correlate the BQ codes, application parameters and resource utilization to establish a baseline.

3.    Create a knowledge base.

4.    Use the knowledge to build a mechanism to trigger and suggest optimized BQ codes.

5.    In addition to the suggestions and optimisations, quantify the efficacy of the optimisations in terms of compute (BQ slots) and runtime.

 

Skill sets:GCP platform fundamentals, Hive, Spark understanding, log analysis, user behavior

Expected learning:Very good understanding of working in a restrictive compute setup on cloud platforms.

Specific courses required for project execution:Cloud Architecture, fundamentals of Hive/ Spark
